results.title: Ingrid Goes West
results.brief_description: Ingrid becomes obsessed with a social network star named Taylor Sloane who seemingly has a perfect life. But when Ingrid decides to drop everything and move west to be Taylor’s friend, her behaviour turns unsettling and dangerous.

constellations_other.name: Reality TV me
constellations_other.description: Cult documentary Grey Gardens follows the everyday eccentricities of mother and daughter Big Edie and Little Edie. The women perform and speak candidly to the camera, and have been described as predecessors to reality TV stars.

results.description: Ingrid becomes obsessed with a social network star named Taylor Sloane who seemingly has a perfect life. But when Ingrid decides to drop everything and move west to be Taylor’s friend, her behaviour turns unsettling and dangerous.
description_for_label: Ingrid becomes obsessed with a social network star named Taylor Sloane who seemingly has a perfect life. But when Ingrid decides to drop everything and move west to be Taylor’s friend, her behaviour turns unsettling and dangerous.

Ingrid Goes West [Trailer] Red Band Trailer // In Theaters August 11th
Ingrid Goes West [Trailer] World Emoji Day Trailer // In Theaters August 11th

results.title: Infernal Affairs
results.creator_credit: Felix Chong Man-Keung, Alan Mak, Andrew Lau and Media Asia Films
results.brief_description: Chan Wing Yan, a young police officer, has been sent undercover as a mole in the local mafia. Lau Kin Ming, a young mafia member, infiltrates the police force. Years later, their older counterparts, Chen Wing Yan and Inspector Lau Kin Ming, respectively, race against time to expose the mole within their midst.

constellations_other.name: Raising the Roof: on-screen levity on rooftop
constellations_other.description: Performances soar to new heights on the rooftop, not only showcasing skylines but also creating electrifying drama, comedy and spectacle.

constellations_other.name: Wong Kar-Wai's Hollywood fingerprints
constellations_other.description: Wong Kar-wai’s modern masterpiece In The Mood For Love is a rich, romantic melodrama that follows the entangled lives of two neighbours (Tony Leung and Maggie Cheung) who develop feelings for each other after learning their spouses are having an affair.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Felix Chong Man-Keung, Alan Mak, Andrew Lau and Media Asia Films
results.description: Chan Wing Yan, a young police officer, has been sent undercover as a mole in the local mafia. Lau Kin Ming, a young mafia member, infiltrates the police force. Years later, their older counterparts, Chen Wing Yan and Inspector Lau Kin Ming, respectively, race against time to expose the mole within their midst.
description_for_label: Chan Wing Yan, a young police officer, has been sent undercover as a mole in the local mafia. Lau Kin Ming, a young mafia member, infiltrates the police force. Years later, their older counterparts, Chen Wing Yan and Inspector Lau Kin Ming, respectively, race against time to expose the mole within their midst.

results.title: In the Mood for Love
results.creator_credit: Paradis Films, Orly Films, Universal Pictures, Block 2 Pictures, Jet Tone Production, Wong Kar-wai and William Chang
results.brief_description: In 1962 Hong Kong, Chow (Tony Leung) and Li-zhen (Maggie Cheung) are neighbours. Their respective spouses are having an affair and the two lonely souls find themselves increasingly attracted to each other, but resist repeating the betrayals of their partners.

constellations_primary.name: Wong Kar-Wai's Hollywood fingerprints
constellations_primary.description: Wong Kar-wai’s modern masterpiece In The Mood For Love is a rich, romantic melodrama that follows the entangled lives of two neighbours (Tony Leung and Maggie Cheung) who develop feelings for each other after learning their spouses are having an affair.

constellations_other.name: Into a World of Colour
constellations_other.description: Filmmakers have been using colour as a method of storytelling since the first moving pictures. Colour can be used to signify emotion, intensify drama or to create a strong visual aesthetic.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Paradis Films, Orly Films, Universal Pictures, Block 2 Pictures, Jet Tone Production, Wong Kar-wai and William Chang
results.description: Hong Kong, 1962: Chow Mo-Wan (Tony Leung Chiu Wai) and Su Li-Zhen (Maggie Cheung Man Yuk) move into neighboring apartments on the same day. Their encounters are formal and polite—until a discovery about their spouses creates an intimate bond between them.
description_for_label: Hong Kong, 1962: Chow Mo-Wan (Tony Leung Chiu Wai) and Su Li-Zhen (Maggie Cheung Man Yuk) move into neighboring apartments on the same day. Their encounters are formal and polite—until a discovery about their spouses creates an intimate bond between them.

results.title: In the Labyrinth
results.brief_description: A multi-image large-format film retelling of the Greek myth of Theseus and symbolizing the life of a modern man; each one in a personal labyrinth that must find their own path to triumph.

constellations_other.name: Big screen dreams
constellations_other.description: With groundbreaking technology and a unique cinema experience, today IMAX theatres are not only loved by audiences but championed by pioneering filmmakers like Christopher Nolan and James Cameron. Yet the route to get there was an unconventional one.

results.description: A multi-image large-format film retelling of the Greek myth of Theseus and symbolizing the life of a modern man; each one in a personal labyrinth that must find their own path to triumph.
description_for_label: A multi-image large-format film retelling of the Greek myth of Theseus and symbolizing the life of a modern man; each one in a personal labyrinth that must find their own path to triumph.

results.title: In Melbourne Tonight
results.brief_description: In Melbourne Tonight, also known as “IMT”, was a highly popular nightly variety television show produced at GTV-9 Melbourne from 6 May 1957 to 1970.

constellations_other.name: 1950s television
constellations_other.description: "Good evening ... and welcome to television." Bruce Gyngell’s famous words launched television in Australia in 1956 on Sydney’s TCN9, with the medium finally arriving in the country towards the later end of the decade.

results.description: In Melbourne Tonight, also known as “IMT”, was a highly popular nightly variety television show produced at GTV-9 Melbourne from 6 May 1957 to 1970.
description_for_label: In Melbourne Tonight, also known as “IMT”, was a highly popular nightly variety television show produced at GTV-9 Melbourne from 6 May 1957 to 1970.

results.title: Icarus
results.creator_credit: Diamond Docs, Rise Films, Impact Partners, Alex Productions, Lagralane Group, The, Mark Monroe, Dan Cogan, Jim Swartz, Bryan Fogel, Jon Bertain, David Fialkow and Timothy Rode
results.brief_description: While investigating the furtive world of illegal doping in sports, director Bryan Fogel connects with renegade Russian scientist Dr. Grigory Rodchenkov—a pillar of his country’s “anti-doping” program. Over dozens of Skype calls, urine samples, and badly administered hormone injections, Fogel and Rodchenkov grow closer despite shocking allegations that place Rodchenkov at the center of Russia’s state-sponsored Olympic doping program.

constellations_other.name: No guts, no glory
constellations_other.description: TV arrived just in time for the 1956 Melbourne Olympics. The Olympics crystallise ideas of nationalism, athletic heroism, and controversy, all of which have been explored through countless features, documentaries and TV shows.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Diamond Docs, Rise Films, Impact Partners, Alex Productions, Lagralane Group, The, Mark Monroe, Dan Cogan, Jim Swartz, Bryan Fogel, Jon Bertain, David Fialkow and Timothy Rode
results.description: While investigating the furtive world of illegal doping in sports, director Bryan Fogel connects with renegade Russian scientist Dr. Grigory Rodchenkov—a pillar of his country’s “anti-doping” program. Over dozens of Skype calls, urine samples, and badly administered hormone injections, Fogel and Rodchenkov grow closer despite shocking allegations that place Rodchenkov at the center of Russia’s state-sponsored Olympic doping program.
description_for_label: While investigating the furtive world of illegal doping in sports, director Bryan Fogel connects with renegade Russian scientist Dr. Grigory Rodchenkov—a pillar of his country’s “anti-doping” program. Over dozens of Skype calls, urine samples, and badly administered hormone injections, Fogel and Rodchenkov grow closer despite shocking allegations that place Rodchenkov at the center of Russia’s state-sponsored Olympic doping program.

results.title: I, Tonya
results.creator_credit: Jennifer Johnson, LuckyChap Entertainment, Clubhouse Pictures, Jade Healy, Margot Robbie, Bryan Unkeless, Tom Ackerley, Steven Rogers, Craig Gillespie, Justin David Burton and Pierina Bustamante
results.brief_description: Competitive ice skater Tonya Harding rises amongst the ranks at the U.S. Figure Skating Championships, but her future in the sport is thrown into doubt when her ex-husband intervenes.

constellations_other.name: No guts, no glory
constellations_other.description: TV arrived just in time for the 1956 Melbourne Olympics. The Olympics crystallise ideas of nationalism, athletic heroism, and controversy, all of which have been explored through countless features, documentaries and TV shows.

results.title: I Was a Teenage Werewolf
results.creator_credit: Sunset Productions, American International Pictures, Gene Fowler Jr., A. Leslie Thomas, Herman Cohen and Aben Kandel
results.brief_description: A hypnotherapist uses a temperamental teenager as a guinea pig for a serum which transforms him into a vicious werewolf.

constellations_other.name: Horror movie right there on my TV
constellations_other.description: The colourful and quirky music video for Skyhooks’ song 'Horror Movie' helped propel them to number one, making it their biggest hit.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Sunset Productions, American International Pictures, Gene Fowler Jr., A. Leslie Thomas, Herman Cohen and Aben Kandel
results.description: A hypnotherapist uses a temperamental teenager as a guinea pig for a serum which transforms him into a vicious werewolf.

results.title: I May Destroy You
results.creator_credit: Lynsey Moore, Paul Cross, Simon Meyers, Simon Maloney, FALKNA Productions and Various Artists Limited
results.brief_description: Set in London, where gratification is only an app away, the story centers on Arabella, a carefree, self-assured Londoner with a group of great friends, a boyfriend in Italy, and a burgeoning writing career. But when her drink is spiked, she must question and rebuild every element of her life.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Lynsey Moore, Paul Cross, Simon Meyers, Simon Maloney, FALKNA Productions and Various Artists Limited
results.description: Set in London, where gratification is only an app away, the story centers on Arabella, a carefree, self-assured Londoner with a group of great friends, a boyfriend in Italy, and a burgeoning writing career. But when her drink is spiked, she must question and rebuild every element of her life.

results.title: I Am Not Your Negro
results.creator_credit: James Baldwin, Velvet Film, Raoul Peck, RTS, Shelter Prod, ARTE, RTBF and Independent Lens
results.headline_credit: Belgium, France and United States of America, 2017
results.brief_description: Working from the text of James Baldwin’s unfinished final novel, director Raoul Peck creates a meditation on what it means to be Black in the United States.

constellations_other.name: MLK/FBI: blackness In America
constellations_other.description: Award-winning documentarian Sam Pollard looks at J. Edgar Hoover and the FBI’s pursuit of Martin Luther King Jr in the lead-up to his assassination during America’s Civil Rights Movement of the sixties.

constellations_other.name: My Hometown: Archives woven into new narrative
constellations_other.description: Offering viewers a snapshot of life on the road for an Australian touring band in the 1960s, 'My Hometown', directed by Sari Braithwaite was developed reimagining archival 8mm footage shot by drummer Leon Isackson.

results.creator_credit_for_label: James Baldwin, Velvet Film, Raoul Peck, RTS, Shelter Prod, ARTE, RTBF and Independent Lens
results.headline_credit_for_label: Belgium, France and United States of America, 2017
results.description: Working from the text of James Baldwin’s unfinished final novel, director Raoul Peck creates a meditation on what it means to be Black in the United States.
